description: Production-ready prompt templates for AI marketing tools - tested patterns from power users

templates.name: Product Hero Shot

templates.name: Icon Design

power_user_tips: Use :: for prompt weighting: 'rocket::2 space::1' emphasizes rocket
Chain styles: 'product photography, editorial, vogue magazine'
Add 'shot on [camera]' for realistic photography look
Use --no to exclude unwanted elements: '--no text, watermark, people'
Remix mode (/prefer remix) allows editing prompts on variations
Pan/zoom on images for extended compositions

elevenlabs.name: ElevenLabs

templates.name: Explainer Video VO
templates.script_style: Conversational, clear, friendly. Short sentences. Active voice. Pause markers [pause] for emphasis.
templates.example_script: Tired of complex software? [pause] Meet SimpleApp. [pause] In just three clicks, you can automate your entire workflow. Let me show you how.

templates.name: Brand Announcement
templates.script_style: Confident, exciting, forward-looking. Build energy through the script. End strong.
templates.example_script: Introducing the future of productivity. [pause] After two years of development, we're proud to unveil Project Atlas. [pause] This changes everything.

templates.name: Social Video Narration
templates.script_style: Punchy, hook-first, personality-driven. Front-load key message. Under 60 seconds.
templates.example_script: Nobody talks about this productivity hack. [pause] But it saved me 10 hours last week. Here's the secret...

templates.name: Testimonial/Story
templates.script_style: Natural, personal, emotional journey. Include specific details. Authentic imperfections okay.
templates.example_script: I honestly didn't think it would work. [pause] But after just one week with the platform, I'd already closed three new deals. [pause] That's when I knew.

templates.name: Podcast/Long-form
templates.script_style: Natural conversational flow. Vary pace. Include thinking pauses. Personality-driven.
templates.example_script: So here's the thing about building a personal brand in 2025... [pause] it's not about being everywhere. It's about being memorable somewhere.

power_user_tips: Use [pause] markers for natural breathing
Clone voices for consistent brand voice
Lower stability for emotional content
SFX mode for non-voice sounds
Projects feature for long-form content
Pronunciation dictionary for brand terms

heygen.name: HeyGen

templates.name: Product Explainer
templates.script_style: Direct address, gesture-friendly points, clear structure
templates.example_script: Let me show you the three features that make this product a game-changer. [gesture] First, the intelligent automation. [gesture] Second, real-time analytics. [gesture] And third, seamless integration.

templates.name: Executive Message
templates.script_style: Personal, visionary, authentic tone. Mix of looking at camera and thoughtful glances.
templates.example_script: I wanted to personally share some exciting news with you. This quarter, we've achieved something remarkable. And I couldn't be prouder of what our team has accomplished.

templates.name: Training/Educational
templates.script_style: Clear instruction, check for understanding, encouraging tone
templates.example_script: In this module, we'll cover the basics of the dashboard. By the end, you'll be able to navigate all core features. Let's start with the main menu...

templates.name: Social Media Hook
templates.example_script: Stop scrolling - this one tip will change how you work. [pause] Ready? Here it is...

templates.name: Personalized Outreach
templates.script_style: Personal (use [name] variables), specific to recipient, clear CTA
templates.example_script: Hi [name], I noticed [company] is expanding into [market]. I wanted to personally share how we've helped similar companies achieve [result]. Let's connect this week.

power_user_tips: Create custom avatar clone for brand consistency
Use variables [name], [company] for personalization at scale
Script natural pauses: avatar movements feel more human
Combine with ElevenLabs for voice variety
API enables batch personalized video creation
Test multiple avatar styles - audience responds differently

claude.name: Claude

templates.name: SEO Blog Post
Social Media Batch
Email Sequence
templates.template:
Create a {num_emails}-email sequence for {campaign_goal}.

Product/Offer: {offer}
Target audience: {audience}
Email timing: {timing}
Brand voice: {voice}

For each email provide:
- Subject line (under 50 chars, A/B option)
- Preview text (90 chars)
- Body copy
- CTA button text
- P.S. line

Sequence arc:
Email 1: Hook and value proposition
Email 2: Problem agitation
Email 3: Solution and social proof
Email 4: Urgency/scarcity
Email 5: Final CTA

Write for conversion while maintaining brand voice.

templates.name: Ad Copy Variations
templates.template:
Create {num_variations} variations of ad copy for {platform}.

Product: {product}
Unique value: {value_prop}
Target audience: {audience}
Objective: {objective}

For each variation, provide:
- Primary text (different angle/hook)
- Headline (under 40 chars)
- Description (under 90 chars)

Variation angles to cover:
1. Problem-focused
2. Benefit-focused
3. Social proof angle
4. Urgency/FOMO
5. Curiosity/question hook

Make each variation distinct enough for meaningful A/B testing.

templates.name: Video Script
templates.template:
Write a {duration} video script for {video_type}.

Topic: {topic}
Key message: {message}
CTA: {cta}
Tone: {tone}

Format:
[HOOK - first 3 seconds, must stop scroll]
[INTRO - establish relevance, 10 seconds]
[MAIN CONTENT - key points, {main_duration}]
[CTA - clear action, 10 seconds]

Include:
- Visual direction in [brackets]
- Pause markers for timing
- B-roll suggestions

Optimize hook for {platform} audience behavior.

power_user_tips: Provide brand voice examples for consistency
Include competitor examples of what NOT to do
Use XML tags for structured output
Chain prompts: outline -> draft -> refine
Include persona details for audience-specific tone
Request multiple variations for A/B testing
